tree.name: Yang Hansen
tree.tradeDescription: Traded Cedric Coward (#11 pick) to Memphis for Yang Hansen, 2027 2nd (ATL own), 2028 1st (ORL own), and 2028 2nd (SAC own)

assetsGivenUp.name: Cedric Coward
assetsGivenUp.note: Drafted 11th overall in 2025, Washington State forward. Traded on draft night.
